languages.text: "Признаюсь, твоя несдержанность меня разочаровывает. С каждым днем ты становишься все более примитивн{mf|ым|ой}, похож{mf|им|ой} на прочих мон-кай. Не позволяй своей животной натуре взять верх — я вижу, в тебе есть нечто большее".

"I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."
languages.original_text: "Признаюсь, твоя несдержанность меня разочаровывает. С каждым днем ты становишься все более примитивн{mf|ым|ой}, похож{mf|им|ой} на прочих мон-кай. Не позволяй своей животной натуре взять верх — я вижу, в тебе есть нечто большее".

traits.locale_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your animal nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your animal nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your animal nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Admito que me decepciona tu falta de autocontrol. Cada día que pasa te vuelves más {mf|primitivo|primitiva}, como los demás mon-keigh. No dejes que tu naturaleza bestial se imponga; puedo ver mucho más en ti».
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: «Admito que me decepciona tu falta de autocontrol. Cada día que pasa te vuelves más {mf|primitivo|primitiva}, como los demás mon-keigh. No dejes que tu naturaleza animal se imponga; puedo ver mucho más en ti».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「正直なところ、お前の自制心のなさには失望した。お前は他のモン＝ケイと同じように、日を追うごとに原始的になっていく。動物的な本能に負けてはいけない…お前ならば、それができるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: 「正直なところ、お前の自制心のなさには失望した。お前は他のモン＝ケイと同じように、日を追うごとに原始的になっていく。動物的な本能に負けてはいけない…お前ならば、それができるはずだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我承认，你毫无克制的行为让我很失望。日复一日，你变得越来越原始，越来越像别的猴子。不要让你的兽性本能占上风，我看得出，你绝不只有这点本事。”
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: “我承认，你毫无克制的行为让我很失望。日复一日，你变得越来越原始，越来越像别的猴子。不要让你的兽性本能占上风，我看得出，你绝不只有这点本事。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je dois bien admettre que je suis déçue par votre manque de retenue. Chaque jour qui passe vous rend plus {mf|primitif|primitive}, plus semblable aux autres mon-keigh. Ne laissez pas votre nature bestiale l'emporter, je vois que vous êtes bien plus que cela. »
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois bien admettre que je suis déçue par votre manque de retenue. Chaque jour qui passe vous rend plus {mf|primitif|primitive}, plus semblable aux autres mon-keigh. Ne laissez pas votre nature animale l'emporter, je vois que vous êtes bien plus que cela. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin enttäuscht von Eurer mangelnden Zurückhaltung, das muss ich gestehen. Ihr werdet mit jedem Tag primitiver, mehr wie andere Chem-Pan-Sey. Lasst Eure bestialische Natur nicht siegen. Ich sehe, dass mehr in Euch steckt."
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin enttäuscht von Eurer mangelnden Zurückhaltung, das muss ich gestehen. Ihr werdet mit jedem Tag primitiver, mehr wie andere Chem-Pan-Sey. Lasst Eure animalische Natur nicht siegen. Ich sehe, dass mehr in Euch steckt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

languages.text: "İtiraf edeyim, kendini dizginlemekten yoksunluğun beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı. Her geçen gün kendini ilkelliğe daha da kaptırıyor, diğer mon-keighlere daha da benziyorsun. Vahşi içgüdülerine yenik düşme. İçinde bundan çok daha fazlasının yattığını görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am disappointed by your lack of restraint, I will admit. Every day you become more primitive, more like other mon-keigh. Do not allow your bestial nature to win out — I can see that there is more to you than that."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf edeyim, kendini dizginlemekten yoksunluğun beni hayal kırıklığına uğrattı. Her geçen gün kendini ilkelliğe daha da kaptırıyor, diğer mon-keighlere daha da benziyorsun. Vahşi içgüdülerinin üstün gelmesine izin verme. İçinde bundan çok daha fazlasının yattığını görebiliyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
